title: Calendar Scheduler
description:
Build a multi-command calendar system that manages appointments.

Commands:
- ADD <date> <time> <description>: Add appointment, return ID and confirmation
- LIST <date>: List all appointments for date, sorted by time
- DELETE <id>: Delete appointment by ID
- EXIT: Terminate program

## Input Format
- First line: N (number of commands)
- Next N lines: Commands (ADD/LIST/DELETE)
- Final line: EXIT

## Output Format
- For ADD: "Added appointment #<id>: <description> at <date> <time>"
- For LIST: Numbered list of appointments with time and description
- For DELETE: "Deleted appointment #<id>" or error if not found
constraints:
- 1 ≤ N ≤ 1000
- Valid dates: YYYY-MM-DD format
- Valid times: HH:MM format (24-hour)
- 1 ≤ description length ≤ 100
